description.value:
You hurl a ball of electricity at a creature within range, making a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 2d10 lightning damage and becomes charged with static electricity. On a miss, the spell ends. For the duration, you can use your action to make a ranged spell attack against any other creature within 15 feet of the charged creature, dealing 2d6 lightning damage on a hit.

Charge: This is a spell that can be Charged, modifying its effects. Costs and effects are as follow:

  • 1 Mana: If you miss the initial spell attack, the spell does not end and the target creature’s space becomes charged with electricity instead. The rest of the spell functions as normal but with the words “charged creature” replaced with “charged space”.
  • 1 Mana: Instead of making a spell attack, you can touch a willing creature to harmlessly charge them with electricity instead. The spell functions as normal, skipping the initial attack damage.
  • 4 Mana: The subsequent spell attacks can be triggered as a minor action.

materials.value: A piece of fur and a glass sphere
